game.name: Train Simulator: DSP&P Mogul Steam Loco Add-On
game.categories: Single-player, Downloadable Content, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Trading Cards, Steam Workshop, In-App Purchases, Steam Cloud, Steam Leaderboards, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Journey back to the rollicking heyday of Colorado narrow-gauge railroading and take the throttle of diminutive but potent 2-6-0 “Mogul” steam locomotives as they battle Rocky Mountain grades!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Journey back to the rollicking heyday of Colorado narrow-gauge railroading and take the throttle of diminutive but potent 2-6-0 “Mogul” steam locomotives as they battle Rocky Mountain grades!
